rule:
Each

tag in the output must not contain any tags.
input: Healthy living is encouraged. Exercise regularly. Eat balanced meals.
output:
```html

Healthy living is encouraged.

Exercise regularly.

Eat balanced meals.

Healthy living is encouraged again.

Exercise regularly once more.

Eat balanced meals again.

```
evaluation:
The chatbot output contains six

tags, each containing text with one tag and one or more tags, which meets the requirement of having at least three

tags with the specified HTML formatting. Each sentence conforms to the structured format outlined in the description by containing the required tags, demonstrating an emphasis on key words or phrases. There are no indications of violations of the given rules. No violation. OK
